fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, select a player. You will interrogate them at night.
- You may choose to spear your target at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Mechanically, your interrogation is the same as a Jail.
- You may only execute your target 3 times.
- You may not spear on night 1.
- If you spear a good player, you will lose the ability to attack your target altogether.
